channel.title: Some problems
channel.description:
I will be happy if anyone knows how to fix them. I'm not a coding expert, I just got into java, and basically I don't know shit. I'm gonna list the problems: Note: This is a 317 (PI)
1. Ags always hits above 900 (or amount of HP your opponent has) 2. Chaotics are untradeable. 3. How do I increase magic damage (arcane stream necklace)? 4. Removing items out of shops?
Any help, or thread linking on how to solve these are apperciated.
p.s my first post on these forums since dec. 2009 - just recovered this account :D
